title: Division at Warp Speed | Guests: Josh Rogin & Michelle Easton | 7/27/21
description:
How severe is the Delta variant? Glenn and Stu look to the U.K. Are the shifting COVID goalposts just meant to keep us divided? Restaurant owner Terry Trobiani calls in to discuss how his city cited him for flying American flags. Journalist Josh Rogin talks Dr. Fauci’s fall from grace and whether more is being covered up. Glenn and Stu discuss Glenn’s upcoming charity art event. Americans aren’t giving up on freeing Cuba from communism as people rise up across the world. Are AI surveillance systems really as trustworthy as we’re told? Glenn and Stu discuss Simone Biles leaving the Olympics. Author Michelle Easton joins to share about her book, “How to Raise a Conservative Daughter.” Will the Jan. 6 committee solve anything?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
